Notes.Text:
This update for caribou fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2021-3567: Fixed a segfault when attempting to use shifted characters (bsc#1186617).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in Caribou due to a regression of CVE-2020-25712 fix. An attacker could use this flaw to bypass screen-locking applications that leverage Caribou as an input mechanism. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
